rows.label: qev087401_MSG0002
rows.name: Sorry t' bother ya, but could I get some tea?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087401_MSG0003
rows.name:
Right away, Commander Vandham.
You've been coming here a lot recently, haven't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087401_MSG0004
rows.name: Old man, you kinda look like you have too much free time-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087401_MSG0005
rows.name: Ah, that's a good thing, y'know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087401_MSG0006
rows.name:
In an organization like this, the more free time the higher-ups have,
the smoother it's runnin'. That's how it is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087401_MSG0007
rows.name:
You have a point, but[ST:wide ]â€”
it also sounds like an excuse for slacking off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087401_MSG0008
rows.name:
Maybe being the BLADE Commander
is actually a pretty easy job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087401_SEL0011
rows.name: Provoke him by saying anyone could do his job.

rows.label: qev087401_SEL0021
rows.name: Flatter him by saying no one but Vandham could do it.

rows.label: qev087401_MSG0009
rows.name: Oh ho! So everyone on Elma's team looks down on the Commander's job, eh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087401_MSG0011
rows.name:
Compared to that,
Elma and Lin are underestimating the Commander position[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087401_MSG0012
rows.name:
Alright, fine! You lot, go ahead and
carefully observe a day in the life of the BLADE Commander![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087401_MSG0013
rows.name: You mean we have to stick close to you all day?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087401_MSG0014
rows.name:
If you did that, you couldn't do your own missions, could ya?
For starters, just try and find me in the mornin'.[ST:wait ]
